comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Frame is dated July 11, 1854.  Is it likely that a frame would have been re-used?

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: It says "Cutting Patent" at the bottom of the frame -- Mr Cutting patented his technique in 1854, so maybe the date refers to that: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Ambrose_Cutting

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Quite right, rjones0856. July 11, 1854 is the date that James A. Cutting was awarded two patents for the ambrotype process.
